請從下方金額選擇您要的金額，或是自行填入想要存款的金額。兩種方式擇一即可。: Please select the amount you want from the amount below, or fill in the amount you want to deposit. You can choose one of the two methods
請輸入購買金額: Enter the amount you want to buy
貨幣未設定匯率: Currency has no exchange rate set
請盡速完成交易: Please complete the transaction as soon as possible
OCoin為平台使用的專屬遊戲幣。: OCoin is the exclusive game currency
請正確使用對應的錢包入款，否則可能造成您入款失敗。: Please use the corresponding wallet to deposit money correctly, otherwise your deposit may fail.
虛擬貨幣入款需經過區塊認證確認，可能需要數分鐘或者更久，完成時間並非由本網站決定: Cryptocurrency deposits are subject to block authentication and confirmation, which may take a few minutes or longer. The completion time is not determined by this website, please be aware.
實際入款遊戲幣為入款金額-手續費後之餘額進行換算。: The game coins actually credited will be converted in the following way. (Deposit Amount)−(Service Charge).
匯率可能隨時變動中，所有交易以本網站的匯率為準，打幣後交易期間若有變動，將以實際: Since the exchange rate is constantly changing, all transactions are based on the exchange rate quoted on this site. When the transaction time changes after a deposit is made, game coins will be issued based on the exchange rate in effect at the time of the deposit. Please update the exchange rate once before depositing to verify the real-time exchange rate before proceeding with the deposit.
ETH and USDT's ERC20 can be checked for contract status via https://etherscan.io/.
您可進入遊戲確認您本次的入金，以及對應的 Bouns 獎勵。: You can enter the game to confirm your deposit and the corresponding Bouns reward.
不同的存款管道可能影響存款金額到達玩家錢包的時間。最遲一個營業日為合理的範圍。: Different deposit method may affect when the deposit amount reaches the player's wallet. One business day at the latest is a reasonable range.
